newsitem.title: HUNGARY: KEKKUTI REPORTS RISING SALES, PROFITS.
newsitem.headline: KEKKUTI REPORTS RISING SALES, PROFITS.

text.p: Hungarian mineral water bottler and distributor Kekkuti Asvanyviz Rt on Tuesday reported rising profits and sales for the first half of 1997.

The company said its sales for the first six months rose 30.5 percent to 766.7 million forints, while pre-tax profits grew by 55.3 percent to 94.1 million and after-tax profits rose by 44.4 percent to 87.5 million.
These figures were calculated in accordance with Hungarian Accounting Standards.

Kekkuti's IAS pre-tax profits rose 50.3 percent to 97.4 million forints in the first half of 1997 over the first six months of 1996, while its after-tax profits were up by 40.1 percent to 90.8 million.
